metadata.name: Rundll32 Execution Without Parameters
metadata.comment: Detects rundll32 execution without parameters as observed when running Metasploit windows/smb/psexec exploit module

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(process.cmd_line)) in ('rundll32\.exe', 'rundll32')))

output.summary: Detects rundll32 execution without parameters as observed when running Metasploit windows/smb/psexec exploit module

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line, process.name, process.parent_process.name False positive: False positives may occur if a user called rundll32 from CLI with no options Reference: https://bczyz1.github.io/2021/01/30/psexec.html
